attributes.action: put an immediate stop to any American actors playing figures from Scottish history
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the people of Scotland hereby wish to ban, Mel Gibson, Christopher Lambert, Liam Nielson and any of those monkeys from playing important figures from our history. We have some excellent actors of our own, such as: Taggert, Super Gran, The Bay City Rollers, Stephen Hendry and I personally think Jimmy Krankie would make an excellent Mary Queen of Scots.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
